name: 4 in a Row ++
description:
Do you still remember the classic game 4 in a Row? It is a high-quality board game！

With tons of fun, 4 in a Row hundred play doed not tire. Now it's available for you to play on iPhone/iPod Touch!



Rules：

4 in a Row(Four in a Row) also known as Captain's Mistress, Four Up(4 Up), Plot Four(Plot 4), Find Four(Find 4), Fourplay(4play), and Four in a Line(4 in a line).

In this game, players first choose a color, then two players take turns to put the pieces on the game board. The player whoever first lets the 4 pieces in a row vertically, horizontally or diagonally is the winner.



Features：

1. Three levels: Easy, Med and Hard, meeting needs of all players.

2. Undo function.

3. Enable to load game progress. Auto-save when exit or phone ring.

4. Challenging computer or play with your friend on the same device, can also play against a friend via bluetooth on two devices.

5. In Game Center, free to play with friends or anyone online.

6. Excellent user interface and exciting sound effects.


Have fun with connect four while improving your level. Why not join now?
